Package org.opensextant.geodesy

Interface GeoPoint

All Known Implementing Classes:
GeocentricPoint, Geodetic2DPoint, Geodetic3DPoint, MGRS, Topocentric2DPoint, Topocentric3DPoint
public interface GeoPoint
A GeoPoint is defined by its interface as any object that can be accurately converted to a Geodetic3DPoint point given a FrameOfReference. GeoPoints can therefore be compared for nearness on the surface of an Ellipsoid model of the Earth, or nearness in space as measured by Euclidean distance. This interface enables the three different point representations used in this geodesy package (Geodetic, Geocentric, and Topocentric) to be abstracted into a single logical type.
